title: No Rp points and i just started playing
body: So i am new to this game and I wanted to confirm whether or not i get free rp points when you first start the game or did it change. I'm not sure . All i know is my Rp is zero and i heard you get an amount of Rp at the start of the game again i do not know if this is true or not.

replies.body: Newer accounts haven't received RP for a while!  It was switched to the [new player chest](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/ZGErnvY4-hextech-crafting-new-player-chests-to-replace-400-rp) to introduce new players to hextech crafting!  You should get a chest containing ashe and garen!
